item.title: [Leetcode] Bag of Tokens(Medium)
item.description: LeetCode 948 - Bag of Tokens You have an initial power of power, an initial score of 0, and a bag of tokens where tokens[i] is the value of the ith token (0-indexed). Your goal is to maximize your total score by potentially playing each token in one of two ways: If your current power is at least tokens[i], you may play the ith token face up, losing tokens[i]power and
